ComicInfo.Summary: Through her newfound addiction to rough sex, Vicki Faith, TV personality, is plunged into an underground cult of bloodthirsty and sex-crazed vampires. Our heroine finds herself in a train compartment, bound and gagged by her own silk stockings. Abused and humiliated by her beautiful but deadly vampiric captor, Vicki manages to escape off the train only to find herself in a spooky old castle somewhere in Eastern Europe filled with, you guessed it, vampires. Pretorius continues to deepen the plot as Vicki Faith becomes involved in some of the most intense S & M action ever portrayed in the comic book format.
